name: Tesseral
long_description:
Tesseral is the open-source auth infrastructure for B2B SaaS.

We provide everything a B2B SaaS company needs to power an enterprise-ready login experience, including:
* A beautiful login page that requires no code to configure
* Support for B2B multitenancy
* User impersonation
* Self-service config for your customers
* Magic links
* Social login
* Enterprise single sign-on (SAML SSO)
* Enterprise directory sync (SCIM)
* Role-based access control (RBAC)
* Multifactor authentication (MFA)
* Passkeys (WebAuthn)
* Authenticator apps (TOTPs)
* API key management
* User invitations
* Webhooks

You can learn more by reading our docs at https://tesseral.com/docs or by checking out our GitHub at https://github.com/tesseral-labs/tesseral.
one_liner: The open-source auth infrastructure for B2B SaaS
